greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest k such that A067030(n) = k + reverse(k).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
example: a(12) = 12 since A067030(12) = 33 and 12 is the smallest k such that 33 = k + reverse(k).
program: (ARIBAS): function a067033(a,b: integer); var n,k,i,rev: integer; st,nst: string; begin for n := a to b do k := 0; while k <= n do st := itoa(k); nst := ""; for i := 0 to length(st) - 1 do nst := concat(st[i],nst); end; rev := atoi(nst); if n = k + rev then write(k,",") k := n + 1; else inc(k); end; end; end; end; a067033(0,500);.
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Dec 29 2001
